tasks.task: Assemble and prepare to use the 7-piece gardening tool set from WorkPro.
subtasks: Take the transplanter and familiarize yourself with its 4-inch depth engravings.
Using the trowel, dig into the soil to make planting holes.
With the hand fork, aerate the soil to improve root growth and drainage.
Employ the weeder to remove precise weeds from the garden beds.
Utilize the cultivator to loosen and spread soil around plants.
Prune stems and small branches using the included pruning shears.

tasks.task: Store the gardening tools for future use.
subtasks: Place the trowel, hand fork, weeder, cultivator, and pruning shears into the storage tote.
Secure the tools inside the tote and close the lid for transport.
Fasten the lanyard loops on the tools for additional attachment options.

tasks.task: Use the 7-piece gardening tool set to perform various tasks in the garden.
